|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 580 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.0;; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS,ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,,^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan (+ac) |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 02/2015 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612E; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== * Product Segment: N600 (300+300 Mbps) * Antenna: 2x external detachable antennas * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5 GHz * Power Supply: external adapter : AC Input : 110~240V (50/60Hz) : DC Output : 12V with max. 1A current * Dimensions 189 x 129 x 36 mm (WxDxH) === [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/rc/sysdeps/init-ralink.c RMerlin's Github] === {{SCollapse|config â€¢ >> |
	#ifdef RTCONFIG_RALINK
	#include 
	#include 
	#endif
 
	#if defined(RTAC52U) || defined(RTAC51U) 
	|| defined(RTN65U) || defined(RTN56U) 
	|| defined(RTN54U) || defined(RTN14U) 
	|| defined(RTN11P) 
 
	switch(model) {
	case MODEL_RTN11P: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN14U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN54U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTAC51U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTAC52U:
	nvram_unset("vlan3hwname");
	if ((wans_cap && wanslan_cap) ||
	(wanslan_cap && (!nvram_match("switch_wantag", "none") 
	&& !nvram_match("switch_wantag", ""))))
	nvram_set("vlan3hwname", "et0");
	break;
	}
 
	switch (model) {
	case MODEL_RTN11P: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN14U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN36U3: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN65U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN54U:
	case MODEL_RTAC51U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTAC52U: /* fall through */
	merge_wan_port_into_lan_ports = 1;
	break;
	default:
	merge_wan_port_into_lan_ports = 0;
	}
}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.asus.com/event/networks_3G4G_support/ Supported 3G/4G dongles] ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-86#3003 On '''iXBT''' forums] (''{{TPFirmware|Padavan}}, RTN'' posts) :[[ASUS RT-AC54U]] = ASUS RT-N54U + 2T2R 802.11ac !! ==See also== *[[List of Padavan firmware supported devices]] *[http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] [[Category:English Documentation]]
